Trial_Design.evidence: 300 patients undergoing hepatic resection were randomly assigned

Intervention.evidence: randomly assigned to fibrin glue application or control groups

Objective.evidence: To evaluate the efficacy, amount of hemorrhage, biliary leakage, complications, and postoperative evolution after fibrin glue sealant application in patients undergoing liver resection.

Method_Outcome.evidence: Characteristics and debit of drainage and postoperative complications were evaluated.

Number_Randomised.evidence: 300 patients undergoing hepatic resection were randomly assigned

Result_Outcome.evidence: no differences were observed in the amount of transfusion (0.15 ± 0.66 vs. 0.17 ± 0.63 PRCU; P = 0.7234)
